text: He kitabavalaharu hamile je utareka chau jasale timro pasama jo cha tyasako pani pusti gardaicha, tyasamathi imana lya'u. Yasabhanda agadi ki hamile manisaharuko anuhara bigari tinala'i pithyumtira pharka'idi'um athava tiniharula'i abhisapta garaum jasto ki sanibaravalaharula'i abhisapta gareka thiyau, allahale juna kurako adesa diyo tyo bha'era nai rahancha
